1: I sing with steady heart and give wholehearted praise.
2: I rise early to make joyful music.
3: I sing joyful praise among all people and nations.
4: Boundless compassion and truth uplift everything beyond measure.
5: Supreme goodness shines above heaven and earth.
6: Steadfast support brings rescue and answers to loved ones.
7: I rejoice and set fair boundaries with wise measure.
8: United people yield strong leadership and just law.
9: I triumph over every land under my care
10: Guidance leads me into strong places.
11: Guiding presence goes with united efforts
12: Seek greater help that brings success.
13: With divine strength, we act bravely and prevail.
